rukus.text: 18|60|mosega geuui chujongja-ege du badaga mannaneun gyochajeom-e ileul ttae kkaji meomchuji ani hal geos-imyeo sunyeon-ilado gyesoghalila balhadeola
18|61|geulihayeo du salab-i gyochajeom e dodalhaess-eul ttae geudeul-i mulgogileul mang-gaghaneunja mulgogineun jaeppaleuge badasog-eulo salajyeossnola
18|62|geudeul-i geugos-eul jinass-eul ttae mosega geuui chujongja-ege joban-eul gajyeoola uliga yeohaeng-eulo pigonhanila

18|63|ittae geuga malhayeossdeola uliga banseog-wilo eunsinhaess-eul ttae jega geumulgogileul ij-eossdeon il-eul saeng-gaghabnikkasatan-i jeolo hayeogeum dangsinkke sang-gi sikim-eul mang-gagkehayeo geu mulgogineun sinbiseuleobge badasog-eulo deul-eoga beolyeossseubnida
18|64|ie geuga malhagil geugos-i balo uliga chajdeon gos-ila geuligo geu dul-eun geudeul-i wassdeon gillo doedol-agassdeola
18|65|geudeul-eun hananim-i eunhyeleul be pul-eo jugo jisig-eul galeuchyeo jun han jong-eul balgyeonhaessnola
18|66|geulihayeo mosega geuege i leugil dangsin-ui jisig-eul baeugi wiha yeo jega dangsin-eul ttala gado doegess seubnikka lago hani
18|67|geuga daedabhayeossdeola dangsin-eun nawa hamkke innaehaji moshal geos-iyo
18|68|dangsin-i alji moshaneun geos-eul eotteohge innaehaliyo lago hani
18|69|geuga hananim-ui tteus-ilamyeon in naehago naega dangsin-eul geoyeoghaji a niham-eul alge doeliyo
18|70|geuga dangsin-i jeoleul ttaleugessda myeon jega dangsinkke seolmyeonghal ttae kkaji amugeosdo mudji masiyo lago hadeo la
